verses.verse: <S%H5186><s%> <S%H241>Hear,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H6041>me,<s%> for I am poor and <S%H6041>needy.<s%>
<S%H8104>Preserve<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> for I am <S%H2623>godly.<s%> <S%H430>You,<s%> my God, <S%H3467>save<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> who trusts in <S%H982>you.<s%>
Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to <S%H136>me,<s%> Lord, for I <S%H7121>call<s%> to you all day <S%H3117>long.<s%>
Bring <S%H8055>joy<s%> to the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> for to <S%H136>you,<s%> Lord, do I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
For <S%H136>you,<s%> Lord, are <S%H2896>good,<s%> and ready to <S%H5546>forgive;<s%> <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to all those who call on <S%H7121>you.<s%>
In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6869>trouble<s%> I will <S%H7121>call<s%> on <S%H6030>you,<s%> for you will answer me.
There is no one like you among the <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> nor any deeds like your <S%H4639>deeds.<s%>
All <S%H1471>nations<s%> you have <S%H6213>made<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H136>you,<s%> Lord. They shall <S%H3513>glorify<s%> your <S%H8034>name.<s%>
For you are <S%H1419>great,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> wondrous <S%H6381>things.<s%> You are God <S%H430>alone.<s%>

<S%H3384>Teach<s%> me your <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in your <S%H571>truth.<s%> Make my <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H3161>undivided<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H8034>name.<s%>
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H136>you,<s%> Lord my <S%H430>God,<s%> with my whole <S%H3824>heart.<s%> I will <S%H3513>glorify<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forevermore.<s%>
For your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> toward <S%H5337>me.<s%> You have delivered my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>

<S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H2086>proud<s%> have <S%H6965>risen<s%> up against <S%H5712>me.<s%> A company of <S%H6184>violent<s%> men have <S%H1245>sought<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and they <S%H7760>don't<s%> hold regard for you before them.

But <S%H136>you,<s%> Lord, are a <S%H7349>merciful<s%> and <S%H2587>gracious<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H7227>anger,<s%> and abundant in loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth.<s%>

<S%H6437>Turn<s%> to <S%H2603>me,<s%> and have mercy on <S%H5414>me!<s%> Give your <S%H5797>strength<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant.<s%> <S%H3467>Save<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of your <S%H519>handmaid.<s%>

<S%H6213>Show<s%> me a <S%H226>sign<s%> of your <S%H2896>goodness,<s%> that those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> me may <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H954>it,<s%> and be shamed, because <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, have <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H5162>me,<s%> and comforted me.
